Chargers head coach Brandon Staley said he spoke to Jackson on Wednesday morning regarding his decision to bench him Monday night, as well as what the plan is for the cornerback moving forward.

articles.title: Commanders' Taylor Heinicke says he's a different QB from last year - ESPN
articles.description: Ahead of his start Sunday against Green Bay, Commanders QB Taylor Heinicke said he feels "a lot more comfortable, a lot more confident" compared to last year.
articles.content:
ASHBURN, Va. -- Washington Commanders quarterback Taylor Heinicke said he's a different player than last season. Now he'll get a chance to prove just how much.

articles.title: Dolphins' Tua Tagovailoa says he lost consciousness after being hit - ESPN
articles.description: Dolphins quarterback Tua Tagovailoa said he lost consciousness after a hit that sent him to a hospital on Sept. 29.
